projects.title: Collateral Management App
projects.description: Collateral App is a Node.JS application which is used to track the real time value of collaterals pledged. The collaterals could be Stocks and Crypto currency. Marketstack and CoinAPI are used to fetch real time prices.Concepts used are Server Side rendering, API fetch etc.

projects.title: LinkedIn Message Generator
projects.description: An app to generate text messages which could be copied and used on LinkedIn to send connection requests.

projects.title: Portfolio Manager App
projects.description: Its a simple .NET app prortfolio management tool, where one can add the stocks , ETFs etc. I used concepts like ASP.NET MVC, Entity Framework and used Alpha Vantage API to fetch real time prices of stocks.
